data.comment: The match is underway at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Goal! Kevin Vandendriessche gives Oostende a 0-1 lead in Bruges.
In the minute 29, Andrew Hjulsager with an assist there.
Cercle Brugge's Johanna Omolo has been booked in Bruges.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
The home team have replaced Johanna Omolo with Charles Vanhoutte. This is the first substitution made today by Paul Clement.
David Bates (Cercle Brugge) has received a yellow card from Jasper Vergoote.
In the minute 55, Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Kylian Hazard replacing Leonardo da Silva Lopes.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Charles Vanhoutte has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Kevin Vandendriessche (Oostende) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Francois Marquet.
In the minute 71, Paul Clement is making the team's third substitution at Jan Breydel Stadium with Thibo Somers replacing Dino Hotic.
Nick Batzner is replacing Andrew Hjulsager for Oostende at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Robbie D'Haese is replacing Fashion Sakala for Oostende at Jan Breydel Stadium.
In the minute 87, Cercle Brugge's David Bates has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
